text:
@Mike_Pence You can tell what a lie that is by this WH actions against immigrants. 
We can tell how precious life is to you & trump. 
Leaving COVID19 unaddressed is killing 1000's of those 'precious lives.'
You want to control womens bodies & rights, but you sure as hell don't protect lives.
